questions.trigger: What were you exposed to? (food, medication, insect sting)
questions.breathing_difficulty: Are you having trouble breathing or swallowing?
questions.swelling: Is there swelling of the face, lips, tongue, or throat?
questions.rash: Do you have hives or widespread rash?
questions.epi_pen_used: Have you used an epinephrine auto-injector (EpiPen)?

triage_rules.reason: Anaphylaxis with airway involvement - Call 911 Immediately - Use EpiPen if available
Anaphylaxis - EpiPen used - Still need Emergency evaluation
